errors.error_description: The text recommends Python 2.7, which is outdated and incompatible with modern versions of scikit-rf and its dependencies.
correction_candidates: Change `(version 2.7 is recommended)` to `(Python 3.8+ is required)`.
Change `(version 2.7 is recommended)` to `(any Python 3 version will work)`.
Remove the sentence `If you have installed Python...` entirely.
